name: TouHouDewValley
description:
Go on a trip and find a treasure box And Farming!

Please combine items or talk to NPCs to solve their difficulties

You can meet various bullet hell patterns!

How to Play ?
>> Move WASD or Arrow
How to dialogue or interact : spacebar key
quest dialogue start spacebar and click mouse continue dialogue

Attack : 'Z' or mouse Click

After farming, you can leave the bottom bar in the blank at the end and press the space bar key to obtain the farm product!
